subject: 3 CGMs committees for recommending the offers of NHAI in conciliation through CCIEs
text: "Ray 74v rTHNf gifea5rut (Ted5 4Rdev & RTHTf HART4, HRG TRa) National Highways Authority of India (Ministry of Road Transport and Highways, Government of India) A7N *tt v1-5 0 6, 7427-10, @RqT, T @cclt 110 075 G-5 & 6, Sector-10, Dwarka, New Delhi-110075 TMN /Phone 91-11-25074100 25074200 NHAI/Policy Guidelines/ Conciliation Committee/2023 Policy Circular No. 2.1.58/ 2023 dated 15th 2023 {Decision taken on E-Office File No. NHAI/CMD /Conciliation/2021-Part(1) (Comp. No. 67745)} Sub: 3 CGMs committees for  recommending the offers of NHAI in conciliation through CCIEs reg: Four Nos of 3-CGM committees were constituted vide NHAI Circular No_ 2.1.56/2022 (Comp. No. 67745) dated 18.11.2022 (Annexure 1) to expedite the disposal of pending cases. 2 _ Now, it has been decided that Sh: Pawan Kumar, CGM(CMD) will replace Sh. Vishal Gupta, CGM(T) in Committee and Sh: C.K. Sinha, CGM(T) will replace Sh: Ajmer Singh, CGM(T) in Committee 2 for all ongoing and future meetings of these committees till further orders. 3 This issues with the approval of Competent Authority. Encl:: As stated above Rsaksk (Sunil Prakash Bhardwaj) Chief General Manager (Coord.) To: AlI Officers of NHAI HQ ROs/ PIUs/ CMUs/ Site Offices to: 1 Hindi Officer for translation in Hindi. 2 _ Library for hosting the circular on library site. 3_ Web Admin for circulation. M 7 7 91 NHAI May, Copy
